excerpt.rendered: Join our dynamic team as a Senior Frontend Developer and help build amazing web experiences.

content.rendered:
We are looking for an experienced Senior Frontend Developer to join our growing team. You will be responsible for developing and maintaining high-quality web applications using modern frameworks and technologies.

As a Senior Frontend Developer, you will work closely with our design and backend teams to create seamless user experiences. You'll have the opportunity to mentor junior developers and contribute to our technical architecture decisions.

requirements: 5+ years of experience in frontend development
Expert knowledge of Vue.js, Nuxt.js, and modern JavaScript
Strong understanding of HTML5, CSS3, and responsive design
Experience with REST APIs and state management

excerpt.rendered: Create beautiful and intuitive user interfaces that delight our customers.

content.rendered:
We're seeking a talented UX/UI Designer to join our creative team. You will be responsible for designing user-centered digital experiences that are both beautiful and functional.

In this role, you'll conduct user research, create wireframes and prototypes, and work closely with developers to bring your designs to life. You'll have the opportunity to shape the visual identity of our products and contribute to our design system.

requirements: 3+ years of experience in UX/UI design
Proficiency in Figma, Sketch, or Adobe XD
Understanding of design systems and accessibility

excerpt.rendered: Build scalable and robust backend systems with Node.js and modern technologies.

content.rendered:
We are looking for a skilled Backend Developer with expertise in Node.js to join our engineering team. You will design and implement scalable APIs and services that power our applications.

You'll work on challenging technical problems, optimize database performance, and ensure the security and reliability of our backend infrastructure. This is a great opportunity to work with cutting-edge technologies and contribute to architectural decisions.

requirements: Strong proficiency in Node.js and Express.js
Knowledge of RESTful API design and microservices
Familiarity with Docker and cloud platforms (AWS, GCP)
